lead_paragraph: LOWENSTEIN--Lucille Fisher, (Greenberg) of Palm Beach and Manhattan, formally of Hewlett Neck, passed on Friday, July 15th, at the age of 95. Beloved mother of Robert Fisher (Janie) and Trudi Haberman (Michael), cherished grandmother of Todd, Heather, Michelle and Eric, adoring great-grandmother of Justin and Alexis. Lucille was happily married to the late Hamilton Fisher and then to Sherman Lowenstein. Funeral services will be held on Sunday, July 17th, Frank E. Campbell Funeral Chapel, 1076 Madison Avenue (corner of 81st Street). Interment at Mt. Lebanon Cemetery. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LOWENSTEIN, LUCILLE FISHER
